description: This PHP file handles user authentication, session management, and login validation for different user roles (mso, cusadmin, admin) in a web interface. It also includes functions to determine if an IP address is internal or external.

methods.name: innerIP
methods.description: Checks if the client IP is within the internal LAN network

methods.name: get_ips
methods.description: Retrieves IP addresses associated with a network interface

methods.name: if_type
methods.description: Determines the type of IP address: lan_ip, cm_ip, or rg_ip
